Verses: 1 andha meenin vayitrilirundhu yOnaa than dhEvanaagiya karththarai nOkki viNNappampaNNi:
2 en nerukkaththil naan karththarai nOkkik kooppittEn; avar enakku uththaravu aruLinaar; naan paadhaaLaththin vayitrilirundhu kookkuralittEn, neer en saththaththaik kEtteer.
3 samuththiraththin nadumaiyamaagiya aazhaththilE neer ennaith thaLLivitteerï¿½; neerOttam ennai soozhndhukoNdadhu; ummudaiya veLLangaLum alaigaLum ellaam enmEl puraNdadhu.
4 naan umadhu kaNgaLukku edhirE iraadhapadikkuth thaLLappattEn; aagilum innamum ummudaiya parisuththa aalayaththai nOkkuvEn endrEn.
5 thaNNeergaL praaNapariyandham ennai nerukkinadhu; aazhi ennaichchoozhndhadhu; kadaRpaasi en thalaiyai sutrikkoNdadhu.

6 parvadhangaLin adivaarangaL pariyandhamum iRanginEn; boomiyin thaazhppaaLgaL endrendraikkum ennai adaikkiRadhaayirundhadhu; aanaalum en dhEvanaagiyakarththaavE, neer en praaNanai azhivukkuth thappuviththeer.
7 en aaththumaa ennil thoindhupOgaiyil karththarai ninaiththEn; appozhudhu en viNNappam umadhu parisuththa aalayaththilE ummidaththil vandhu sErndhadhu.
8 poiyaana maayaiyaip patrikkoLLugiRavargaL thangaLukku varum kirubaiyaip pOkkadikkiRaargaL.
9 naanOvenil thudhiyin saththaththOdE umakkup paliyiduvEn; naan paNNina poruththanaiyai seluththuvEn; ratchippu karththarudaiyadhu endraan.
10 karththar meenukkuk kattaLaiyittaar, adhu yOnaavaik karaiyilE kakkivittadhu.
